English.Text: The patient grabs the doctor's head and smashes it against the table. The doctor was tapping his knee to check reflex, when the devil cut loose. "He wants putting out of his misery," a sailor cries, once the man is wrestled to the deck again. So they cut his throat. Attention turns to the doctor, but he is a doctor no more. Injury has rendered him insensible; an eight-year-old boy trapped in the body of a man!
